pr_title: [Alter]Clean SchemaChangeJobV2 when schema change CANCELLED or FINISHED

timeline.author: kangkaisen

replies.bodyText: why use writeDouble? indexIdMap.size() is a integer type.
replies.author: WingsGo

replies.bodyText: Ignore me. I yesterday looked the code write out.writeInt(indexIdMap.size()); twice. So I said write double.
replies.author: kangkaisen

timeline.author: kangkaisen

replies.bodyText: I just use the origin code, why we don't need this check?
replies.author: WingsGo

replies.bodyText: We only call readJobFinishedData If Catalog.getCurrentCatalogJournalVersion() >= FeMetaVersion.VERSION_80 is true.
replies.author: kangkaisen
